content.text:
# Breed of Battle

"Breed of Battle" is a Sailor Steve Costigan short story by Robert E. Howard.  It was originally published in the November 1931 issue of Action Stories.
The story is now in the public domain.
References
External links
* [http://www.howardworks.com/subject.htm#costigan List of stories and publication details at Howard Works]
